name: RAMBOAT: Action endless runner
description:
Grab your flamethrower and help Mambo and his troop of heroes to save the world from the General’s Evil Army in this 2D shoot’em up adventure! Ramboat: Shoot and Dash uniquely blends the genres of action, shooter and jumping games, the best jump endless shooting experience.

Do you like run and gun? Then you’ll love this 2D shooter action-packed adventure! Face hundreds of soldiers, tanks, submarines, robots and don’t stop jump and shoot on a new shooting runner game whilst firing powerful weapons and ride your ship like a jetpack. Survive an army of soldiers, paratroopers, rocket launchers and epic enemy bosses. Are you addicted to run and shooting?

Your escape begins, by an intuitive and simple one-finger control you will become a bullet killer, jump and shoot on your screen and destroy the enemy army on a 2D shooter action simulator. Instant casual action, endless shooting runner in your mobile or tablet one of the best game.

During your run, get power ups to increase your firepower and collect coins to upgrade your 2D shooter guns and bullet force, buy amazing vehicles and improve your skills. Be a stronger agent, jump and gun in each battle and be the hero our team needs. What is the highest combo you can get on this action-packed jumping shooting adventure?

Jump or dash, run or shoot, what if we try this bullet game? Feel the blistering pace and the heat of battle in your hands. Assault all scenarios with your favorite hero and resist each challenge in an jump and gun adventure. You have never seen before such an exciting and 2D shooter runner game! Will you survive this war?


GAME FEATURES

ORIGINAL MISSIONS AND STAGES
Rush through incredibles stages that increase the difficulty and enjoy the best action-shooting game! Complete as many as you can to earn coins to buy shooter guns and gain experience to raise your level and your military rank.
Tons of hidden achievements are waiting you in this endless runner. Can you unlock all the medals and be the best soldier?

POWERFUL ARSENAL
Welcome to a shooting arcade with army weapons like the homing missile, machine gun, flamethrower, pistol or laser! Upgrade your guns and increase their x power, shooting rate or bullet force. Boost your firepower and hit the enemy lines!
Try the best gadgets and go to war fully equipped! Have you ever activated power dash to bring death to all enemies in this endless action-packed?

CHARACTERS AND SHIPS
Try unique band members, each with their special equipment and skills. Drive boats like a luxury yacht, a pirate ship, a dragon, a flying cloud or a hungry shark on a never ending run game!
Play with the presidential Mr. Blond, the rock King, the powerful Wukong, the spatial Gunman or the crazy Leader. Regular updates with more content! Can you collect them all?

GAME MODES
Old school non-stop action style with modern details. Play with a friend in multiplayer and double the fun in the ultimate endless shooting runner. Who will kill more enemies in this jumping shooting game?
Try the elite mode if you have what it takes and overcome the challenge. Shoot and dash like a bullet killer!

QUALITY DETAILS
Very easy to play with a simple and intuitive interface. Jump and shooting like old school game!
Get your weapons ready for the ultimate action-shooting game. Music and sound effects that make you shoot and dash even faster with these 2D elements!
Sync with your Facebook profile and share your score with all your friends!


Why not check out the official game video? Join thousands of players in this action-packed adventure! You won't stop shooting, running and killing. Gunfire, explosions and endless shooter arcade:
https://youtu.be/PTwZhwluZdA
